snippet: A federal judge said that Muslims who have been waiting for months to get a permit should be allowed to worship at their new center in time for Ramadan.
abstract: Federal Judge Todd J Campbell issues a temporary restraining order that will allow members of the Islamic Center of Murfreesboro to worship in their new mosque in time for the beginning of Ramadan; mosque's construction has become a flashpoint for anti-Muslim sentiment, leading to several instances of vandalism and harassment.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge said that Muslims who have been waiting for months to get a permit should be allowed to worship at their new center in time for Ramadan.

headline.seo: Judge Allows Muslims to Use Murfreesboro Mosque
headline.main: Judge Allows Muslims to Use Tennessee Mosque
headline.print_headline: Judge Allows Muslims To Use Tennessee Mosque
